title: 73/294. Twenty-fifth anniversary of the Fourth World Conference on Women

paragraphs.1: Decides, in order to celebrate the twenty-fifth anniversary of the Fourth World Conference on Women, so as to accelerate the realization of gender equality and the empowerment of all women and girls, to convene a one-day high-level meeting of the General Assembly in the margins of the general debate of the Assembly at its seventy-fifth session, and that the outcome of the high-level meeting shall take the form of a Chair’s summary;
paragraphs.2: Recommends that the President of the General Assembly conduct consultations to finalize the organizational arrangements for the high-level meeting of the Assembly.
